department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Modifying the deadline for response of this office furniture tender
full_summary:
### Notice of Intention to Award a Supply Contract
#### EH990-231303 Rotary Chairs Contract
#### Tender Number: WS3775055233
#### Date of Publication: January 5, 2023

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award a contract for the provision of Office Furniture, specifically Rotary Chairs, under a Supply Arrangement (SA) No. E60PQ-120001/G.

#### Tender Details
*   Tender Number: WS3775055233
*   Tender Closing Date: January 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: January 24, 2023
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Description
This notice of intention to award a contract is issued pursuant to a Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-120001/G, which covers a requirement from the product sub-category of Rotary Chairs and Stools.

The Government of Canada intends to award a contract for the delivery of Office Furniture to a single supplier. The contract will be for a period of (insert timeframe).

Bidders must ensure they have the necessary documentation and submit their bids in accordance with the instructions provided.

#### Contact Information
To obtain a copy of the RFP, please contact:

J. Ortiz
PSPC/SPAC
jose.ortiz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gca



Note:
*You can not submit a bid electronically. Please see the procurement documents for instructions*
*Please note that the bid closing date has been modified. The bid must be submitted by January 20, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST*



You can reach out to [Jose Ortiz](mailto:jose.ortiz@tpsgc.pwgsc.gca) to obtain the procurement documents. Please be sure to submit your bid by the provided deadline.
